Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

Create requests session using Selenium WebDriver cookies.

steps.name: Open Plugins Page
Go to Plugins Page
Assert that menu item "Available plugins" is available
Open Available plugins Page
Go to Available Plugins Page
Assert that Search Available Plugins field is visible
Wait for the element to be visible
Assert that list of plugins available for installation is displayed
Assert that "Install" button is visible
Wait for the element to be visible
Assert that "Install" button is disabled
